overview: Absent-minded Chloe accidentally double-books a rental cabin for the weekend...and it's the best mistake she's ever made! The fun starts with Chloe joining AJ Applegate and Jay Smooth for a wild threesome. Then she falls head over heels for Lucas Frost during a passionate scene in front of a roaring fire. Couples friendly feature great for setting the mood.
tagline: ...and it`s the best mistake she`s ever made!
title: Double Booked
